fields.Title of Presentation: Subversive Fictions: Aesthetics and Culture in the Central American Avant-Garde
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: AATSP American Association of Teachers of Spanish and Portuguese
fields.Description/Abstract: In this paper I argue that Miguel Ángel Asturias employs surrealist strategies in 'Leyendas de Guatemala' not only as a rejection of realism and positivism, but also as a form of cultural exploration and continued resistance to the effects of colonialism.
